lines.text: He can run, but he can't outrun his mind. It's coming apart, dream by dream...
Think you're just a regular kid? Sorry, bud, you're a lab rat.
You know me. You've seen me.
Your grades came in the mail today, Poindexter. Tell me, were you sent from the planet Pocket Protector, or did they clone you from Einstein's pubes?
How would you like it if your worst nightmares came true?
My worst nightmares are *nothing* compared to this!
Look, Maria, I'm sorry I got you into all this.
Hey, I had nothing better to do.
Boys, boys! We're not here to argue over who has the biggest conspiracy!
